question: Ease of doing business' report, that was seen in news, is released by which organisation?
explanation:
The World Bank releases the 'Ease of doing business' report, to rank 190 countries on the basis of their measures to promote trade.
Recently, the World Bank announced that it has paused the publication of the report amidst concerns of Data manipulation. A Wall Street Journal report said that data of four countries including and the UAE is said to have been allegedly altered.
